fullText: The revival of Suzan-Lori Parks's Pulitzer Prize-winning play starring Corey Hawkins and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II is a masterclass in sibling rivalry and the American dream deferred.
dtliExcerpt: The revival of Suzan-Lori Parks's Pulitzer Prize-winning play starring Corey Hawkins and Yahya Abdul-Mateen II is a masterclass in sibling rivalry and the American dream deferred.
bwwExcerpt: How wonderful to experience again, in the hilarious, harrowing and superbly acted Broadway revival that opened on Thursday at the Golden Theater, Parks's fearlessness. Rejecting fixed meanings, as well as the limitations and clich√©s of correctness, she generates themes that her play will not so much...
